u.a: Bud and ida enter Bud goes to car smiles laughs and looks sad and just stares , ida mumbles this .
Bud stops smiling and speaks .
ida still very quiet .
Bud turns wheel smiles and ida gives him a dirty look , Bud stops smiling and asks .
ida fidgets and grimaces .
Bud goes over to other part of room .
Bud holds something up .
for the next 1 line(s): ida nods and fidgets , ida moves and looks at walls , both are silent .
Bud points at mirror .
ida pays no attention to this .
Bud is persistent .
ida still dejected keeps talking about self after acknowledging machine .
Bud pays attention .
ida looks straight at Bud and sadly speaks .
for the next 8 line(s): ida and Bud are speaking silently to each other and glancing around the room .
Bud emphasizes with force .
Bud opens lunch box , loud and with excitement , ida pays no attention .
is said after a long pause .
Bud points at mirror .
for the next 4 line(s): is said very softly . common focus of attention is the mirror .
interruption for the next 6 line(s): Bud attempts to get ida's attention and succeeds .
when esther leaves Bud is again excited and smiles at the new box
Bud picks up hat and hands it to ida , ida hits it away and speaks .
and answers in the same sadden way .
Bud attempts to console ida .
they decide not to check .
ida changes subject and looks at walls Bud looks in mirror and walks out of sight , looks in mirror again .
interruption three minute pause: ida looks at floor , Bud goes and sits on car , ida is still moping , Bud looks at ida , Bud hears voices outside . enter esther as Bud glances at door .
for the next 1 line(s): esther brings clothes and tells Bud to open suit case which he begins to do with a little excitement ida has no interest .
Bud opens suitcase and softly but with excitement .
ida walks closer in response to this
ida speaks and Bud looks solemn and stares at floor taps fingers on table but does not attract ida .
Bud stands up and timidly looks ida in eye and speaks .
ida speaks which is not a response to Bud and is very quiet yet with force .
is a direct response to Bud and is said in same soft voice .
Bud speaks and walks out of sight .
is a question directed at Bud .
is a continuation
a response .
is an explanation .
Bud speaks and walks over to the stool .
for the next 8 line(s): is said in the same tone with zero action .
interrupts Bud with force .
for the next 2 line(s): is a discussion about when they have to play .
ida again expresses her desire to leave .
Bud joins in .
ida shakes her head in response to this .
for the next 9 line(s): is said in same sad tone with ida looking around room occasionally , nothing exciting .
